content.text: Zel is the pseudo-son of Hansel
Zel strives to understand his history and his biology in order to change the powers that influences the planet he lives in.
Zel is a kind man who always thrives to be a good person despite his upbringing. He is determined and passionate and tries his best to extend help to others if he could bring himself to.
He's weak and a coward, his fear of hurting people due to his biology has estranged him from others and to make a proper change in the church he's supposed to lead.
